document.heading: Disclosure of Information to the Council Amendment Act of 2009

history.narrative: Law 18-119, the “Disclosure of Information to the Council Amendment Act of 2009”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-491, which was referred to the Committee on the Whole. The bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 1, 2009, and December 15, 2009, respectively. Approved without signature by the Mayor on January 14, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-267 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-119 became effective on March 11, 2010.
